imdb.plot outline: Young reporter Jess heads to Aardman Animations in Bristol to get advice from the experts on how to tell great stories on the big screen. Producers, writers and storyboard artists all took the time to talk about how Shaun the Sheep was created, what he's been up to so far and why they felt he was deserving of a feature length outing. They also talk about the huge effort that goes into producing a feature length stop-motion animation, and the unique challenges of creating a film without any dialogue.
imdb.title: Shaun the Sheep the Movie Green Light to Opening Night
akas: Shaun the Sheep the Movie Green Light to Opening Night (United Kingdom)
plot: Young Into Film reporter Jess goes behind-the-scenes at Aardman Animations to find out how Shaun the Sheep Movie was made.

Young reporter Jess heads to Aardman Animations in Bristol to get advice from the experts on how to tell great stories on the big screen. Producers, writers and storyboard artists all took the time to talk about how Shaun the Sheep was created, what he's been up to so far and why they felt he was deserving of a feature length outing. They also talk about the huge effort that goes into producing a feature length stop-motion animation, and the unique challenges of creating a film without any dialogue.
